description: Logan Novak is new to Lucas Entertainment, but Michael Lucas snatched him right up when he showed interest in filming with the studio. But he put it out there right away that he was a bottom and wanted his first scene to be with a top that knows what’s he is doing. After all, who doesn’t admire a man who is confident in his skill? It just so happens that Sebastian Young was in town, and he was the perfect match for Logan, who was itching for a rough-and-tumble bareback fuck. And that’s exactly what Sebastian gives him!
title: Logan Novak Bottoms Bareback for Sebastian Young
